EmailTemplate.description: Email Template can be used to get Machine Key, Contact Details, Device Details and Other information
EmailTemplate.name: Machine Key & Other Details for ASC Information
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}
Greetings! Thanks for showing your interest in the renewal of the Annual Support Contract for the IXM WEB Instance details we shared with you.
Before moving forward, we need the following details from your end for a smooth transition:
IXM Web Version
Log in to IXM WEB To get this go to the admin menu that is available at the top-right corner. Click on Admin Menu Click About IXM WEB Here, IXM WEB Version will be displayed.
Machine Key from IXM WEB
Log in to IXM WEB To get this go to the admin menu that is available at the top-right corner. Click on Admin Menu Click About IXM WEB You will find a Machine Key over there, copy that machine key, and provide us in the text format (please do not provide these details in an image format).
The total number of devices registered in the IXM WEB. Device Serial Numbers.
Kindly rest assured once we receive these details we will promptly revert to you with a further course of action.
